name: Whiteboard Target Game
description:
This is designed to be used on the whiteboard/projector in a classroom. Use a suction dart gun to shoot the targets.

You can set up teams to track scores. Select a team and click the target that was shot to assign points.

All screens are different sizes. If you need to alter the size and position of the targets you can. Use the arrow keys to move the targets and the +/- keys to change the size.
